Node.definition: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= man; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) in post exilic times
= person from Media (מָדַי)

Node.gloss: to strengthen|to give strength, to fortify|to repair|to let prevail
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause humans and objects to be strong in a physical, political, or military sense

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= state in which a countable entity is the fourth in a range
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= state in which humans are strong in political sense
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God
= causative action by which someone causes someone else's inactivity to end so that he comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= nation, usually identified with Greece; considered the descendants of Japheth (יֶפֶת) through his son Javan
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= causative action by which humans divide an object or a set of objects into two or more parts
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
literally: wind; = one of the four quarters of heaven, ◄ associated with the wind ► used for orientation purposes

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
literally: (one's) end; hence: = people born as one's offspring
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

= state in which humans have the strength or power they need to function well
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power

= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= process by which males among humans and animals generate offspring|= a person in the beginning of life

= a young branch springing from the main stock of a tree or plant; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote human offspring
= a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God

= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ made by pouring molten metal into a mold, ► and functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= state in which objects have such a high quality ► that they provoke in others the desire to possess them

= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose

literally: to cause to fall; hence: = causative process or action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to be killed or severely wounded by enemies

= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert

= experience by which humans see something in a dream or trance, or as a supernatural apparition
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them

= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

= earthen mound, cast up against the wall of a city ► in order to enable to enemy to scale the wall
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= population center that has been fortified with the help of a strong and solid wall and possibly other defense works; ≈ associated with security

= state in which humans have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others

= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= causative action by which humans (or deities by human hands) cause land, buildings, or other objects to be unfit for religious use ◄ usually by unlawful behavior
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God

= a reference to the physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing, ► functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship, ≈ with a very strong added connotation of something utterly detestable
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is contrary to (God's) law, ► resulting in a state of guilt
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to become impure in character, without regard or respect for God
literally: to be smooth; hence: = state in which an event appears to be well intentioned, though actually being insincere
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to be strong (mentally)|to be courageous|to stand firm|to be resolute

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to be wise|to have understanding|to be skilled
Node.definition: = state in which humans have the ability to understand things

Node.definition: = pattern of actions by which someone helps others to gain knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= hot glowing body of fire (אֵשׁ) ≈ poetic
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= all sorts of goods, taken forcibly from an enemy in war
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them
= process by which humans receive assistance or supported from other humans or deities
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event
= action by which humans associate themselves with another human, a group of people, or a deity for a particular purpose
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which words have the appearance of being well intentioned, though actually being insincere

Node.gloss: to be wise|to have understanding|to be skilled
Node.definition: = state in which humans have the ability to understand things
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them

= causative action by which deities improve the character of humans by leading them through difficult circumstances, ◄ like a goldsmith improves the quality of a precious metal by smelting it in the fire and so removing all contaminants
= causative action by which a deity causes humans to carefully examine themselves in order to evaluate their behavior and make improvements where necessary
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
= a fixed point in time for a particular event

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

literally: to make oneself high; hence: = action by which humans or deities bring themselves an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

Node.gloss: to make oneself great|to show one's greatness|to magnify oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities show others their elevated status, which they have, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans complete a task with the expected or desired outcome
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to be finished|to be completed|to come to an end|to be past
Node.definition: = process by which an activity comes to full completion
= action by which humans or deities express their intense anger; ◄ caused by someone else's behavior, ► almost invariably resulting in punishment for the party that is responsible
literally: to cut a decision; hence: = action by which humans or deities come to a formal and authoritative decision about something

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= human or deity that is the object of someone else's desire
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

Node.gloss: to make oneself great|to show one's greatness|to magnify oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities show others their elevated status, which they have, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God
= action by which humans, deities, or animals treat other humans, deities, times, or objects with honor and respect
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= indirect male progenitor
= action by which humans, deities, or animals treat other humans, deities, times, or objects with honor and respect
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= small object ◄ consisting of a variety of stone that is considered precious because of its beauty and scarcity; ► used as ornament or decoration; ≈ association with honor, majesty, and glory
= state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and desirable

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= area that has been fortified with the help of a strong and solid wall and possibly other defense works; ≈ associated with security

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which something is associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or deities show a favorable attitude to (other) humans
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= causative action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= the amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= soldier riding a horse
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which something is beautiful and attractive to look at
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= the largest among two or more parts of one group
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= nation; ◄ situated E. of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) according to founded by Ben Ammi (בֶּן־עַמִּי) son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action

Node.gloss: to lay (one's) hands (on someone or something)
Node.definition: literally: to stretch out (one's) hand (against someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities engage in an act of violence against (other) humans

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= objects of value
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= state in which objects have such a high quality ► that they provoke in others the desire to possess them
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= land and ethnic group ◄ located west of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► often fighting in Egyptian army
= member of the ethnic group ◄ that is regarded as descendants of Cush, son of Ham (חָם)

= action by which humans, divine beings, or certain events cause (other) humans to experience a state of great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such as trembling and pain
literally: the rising (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= state in which an event has a high intensity

Node.gloss: to destroy|to exterminate|to wipe out|to demolish
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

Node.gloss: to destroy|to kill|to exterminate|to wipe out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans wipe out (other) humans and objects from existence
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= action by which humans erect a temporary place of residence ◄ by putting stakes in the ground
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= construction; ◄ made out of quality cloth; ► used as a temporary residence by a king when travelling
= the area separating two or mores locations
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which something is beautiful and attractive to look at
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
